name: Peaches and Dreams
description:
Peaches and Dreams is a special project made for the 2021 Indie Galactic Space Jam, it is designed to run on a projection sphere. You are trying to reach home to Earth, fight through Tesla vehicles on Mars, Space gators, and dolphins with your love shots and return home to Cape Canaveral. 

(Requires a controller to play)

Credits

  • Josh Jones - 3d Artist
  • Jeremiah - 3d Modeler
  • Anthony Maneo - Programmer
  • Jonathan Montague - Sound designer
  • Cindy Moon - Game Designer
